description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Scorpion Critic unmasked: or, animadversions on a pretended review [by J. G. Lockhart] of “Fleurs, a poem, in four books,” which appeared in Blackwood's Edinburgh Magazine, for June, 1821. In a letter to a friend. By the author of “Fleurs, etc.” [i.e. N. J. Hollingsworth.] MS. note [by Lord Cockburn]" Contributor: HOLLINGSWORTH, Nathaniel John. Contributor: Lockhart, J. G. (John Gibson) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11641.f.23." Page: 5 Place of Publishing: Newcastle Date of Publishing: 1821 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001254160 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
